https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/pxcvdUjNasq2x9cuJWtpr7JY4VC.jpg Odessa is a beautiful girl addicted to the attention and money that being an adult film star brings. William, a lonely mechanic, has a crush on her, and she indulges his fantasy and leads him on. Thinking he can save her and help her find a normal life, he befriends her drug-fueled bodyguard, Angry Jack, to get close to her. Beautiful Girl
